17046.<if_woman>「さっすが <pc>！\n 話の わかる女だぜ！<else>:
I knew you'd understand, <pc>!
You totally get it!

17048.「これより 若葉の探検隊の 結成だ！！:
From this moment forward, the Squad of New
Leaves is a go!!

17050.「あの封印された書物は あたしと\n <pc>さんが 見つけたんですよ。\n ３:
<pc> and I found that book together.
It's not fair that only you three get to
search...

17051.「フンッ。ようし いいだろう！\n それでは チビのアカシを加えて\n 改めて:
Hmph. Alright, fine! Now, with Akashi
joining us... Once again, the Squad of New
Leaves are a go!!

17052.「よく聞け 隊員たちよ！\n 我々の目的は この村の地下にあるという\n 謎の部:
Listen up! Our objective is to find the
mysterious Hall of Old, which is somewhere
underneath the village.

17056.「すぐに 聞き込みに出発せよ！\n 諸君らの はたらきに 期待しているぞ！:
Set out for investigation right away!
I'm counting on you all to do your best out
there!

17057.「へえ…… これが 知恵の社で見つかった\n 封印された書物なのかい？:
I see... So this is the sealed book you found
within the shrine?

17058.「は はいっ！ ハジカ先生。\n その…… 先生なら この本が\n どれくらい古:
Y-yes! I...was wondering if you might know
how old this book is...

17061.「……なるほど 状況は わかった。\n 君たち探検隊の ヒントになるような助言が:
... I see. I think I understand the situation.
I don't think I can offer any useful advice
for your squad, but...

17062.「この書物に ほどこされていた\n 封印の術式と 劣化具合から言って およそ\n:
Judging by the technique used to seal the book
and how deteriorated said seal is, I can
safely estimate it is at least 300 years old.

17063.「……３００年前といえば このツスクルの村に\n 学びの庭が つくられた時代のは:
...300 years ago would be about the time when
the village's Garden of Learning was
built. Interesting coincidence, no?

17064.「つまり……学びの庭が つくられたころには\n まだ 神代の間が 使われていたっ:
But then... Is it possible the Hall of Old
was still in use when the Garden of Learning
was built...?

17065.「それにしても すごいじゃないか。\n <pc>君といったか……\n よく こん:
Regardless, it's an amazing find.
<pc>, was it? I'm surprised you
managed to find such a book.

17066.「はんっ！ こっちだって 負けてないぜ！ \n 先生 見てくれよ！ これ コノタ:
Hmph! Not about to lose again! Hey, teach!
Look at this really old and super nice love
letter Konota found!

17068.「あっ そうだ！！ 思いだしましたよ！: Oh, that's right! I just remembered!

17069.「授業で習ったことなんですが……\n ３００年前の 学びの庭の建設には\n ある:
It was in one of my classes... I learned that
a family of architects were involved in
building the Garden of Learning 300 years ago.

17070.「一族の名は ドン家。 \n ドワチャッカ大陸の ドルワーム王国に\n 今も続く:
They're the Don family. They're all famous
architects who still live in Dolworm Kingdom
to this day.

17071.「その ドン家を訪ねれば 当時の\n 村の記録が 残っているかもしれません。\n:
If we go and visit them, maybe we can find some records of the village back then. Who knows, maybe we can find something about
the Hall of Old, too!

17072.「どうです？ 名推理じゃありませんか？:
Well? It's pretty smart reasoning, don't you
think?

17073.「まあ 悪くないアイディアだ。\n 隊員たちよ！ さっそくドルワームに出発せよ！:
Well...it's not a bad idea. Squadron! Set out
for Dolworm immediately! We're gonna
visit this "Don" family of architects!

17074.「隊長は この学びの庭で 報告を待つ。\n 諸君らの はたらきに 期待しているぞ:
Your captain eagerly awaits your report here
in the Garden of Learning. I'm counting on
your success!

17075.「はいはい 偉大な建築家 ドン・パパチョなら\n ワシのことだけども。ははあ……:
Yes, yes...if you're looking for the great architect, Don Papachoーthat's me. Ha ha. You are searching for the mysterious room
under Tsuskuru Village?

17076.「そりゃまた オツなことを してるねえ。\n いいよ いいよ。昔の図面とか\n:
Doing something pretty special, aren't you?
No worries. I must have some old blueprints
laying around here somewhere. Let me check.

17077.「はい おまたせ。\n これが ３００年前に描かれた\n 学びの庭の 設計図さ。:
Here we are. These are the blueprints for
the Garden of Learning from 300 years
ago.

17078.「たしかに 当時 ツスクルの村の地下には \n 神代の間って部屋が あったみたい:
Looks like there really was a room called the
Hall of Old back then.

17080.「昔 ツスクルの村の地下には\n 迷宮が 広がっていたらしいね。\n その奥に:
Apparently, there was a maze underneath the
village...and at the deepest part looks to be
the Hall of Old.

17081.「学びの庭は その迷宮の真上に建てられた。\n そして 迷宮の入り口は\n 職員:
The Garden of Learning was built right above
that maze...and its entrance is inside the
staff dormitory.

17082.「それが ここ……。\n 桜の間って呼ばれてる 部屋みたいよ。:
That's this, right here...
I guess the room's called the Chamber of
Cherry Blossoms.

17084.「桜の間は…… 妙なウワサが絶えないから \n 使われなくなったっていう\n い:
The Chamber of Cherry Blossoms...there were
lots of weird rumors about that place, so
it ended up being abandoned.

17085.「あ あの部屋だけは ダメだ！\n あそこに行くのは 絶対ヤバイって！！\n だ:
Anything but that place! It's WAY too
dangerous! And I know that because I...
I've seen it, too...!

17087.「あははっ！ そんなの 見まちがいですよ。\n そんなことより 神代の間の あり:
Hahaha! There's no way you really saw a ghost.
Anyway, the important thing is that we finally
know where the Hall of Old is!

17088.「さあ はやく 学びの庭に 帰りましょう。\n シシノタに 教えてあげなくちゃ！:
Come on, let's get back to the Garden of
Learning. We need to tell Shishinota!

17089.「ないっ！ ないない！\n たしかに ここに置いたのに\n どこに いっちまった:
W-where is it?! It's gone!!
I was sure that I put it RIGHT here,
but it's nowhere to be found!!

17090.「あんちゃーん なにやってんだ？: What's wrong, bro? What are you doing?

17091.「す…すまん コノタ。 \n オレたちの宝が…… \n ラブレターが 消えちまっ:
S-sorry, Konota...
That love letter, our treasure...
It's gone.

17092.「ええええ～～！！ なんでだよ！\n あんちゃんの アホンダラ！！\n この ス:
Whaaaaaat?! Why?!
You're an idiot, bro! You've got
Slime for brains!

17093.「うるせえバカ！ もう いいだろ。\n 今じゃ 神代の間が ブームなんだから。\:
Shut up, you dummy! Ugh, whatever! We should be focusin' on the Hall of Old anyway. Speaking of...did you have any luck
in Dolworm?

17094.「そうか そうか。でかしたぞ 隊員たち！\n 職員宿舎にある 桜の間が 神代の間:
Hmm, I see... Well done, squad! So...the Chamber of Cherry Blossoms in the staff dorm leads to an underground maze...and from there
is the Hall of Old.

17095.「ダ……ダメだよ。やめよう あんちゃん！\n あの部屋には 女の幽霊が 出るんだ:
H...hang on, we can't, bro! They say there's
a ghost of a woman in that room. I've seen
it myself!!

17096.「ハイハイ お前のことだから\n どうせ なにかと 見まちがえたんだろ。:
Yeah, yeah... Knowing you, you probably were
just seein' things.

17097.「諸君！ まずは 長旅ご苦労であった！\n 君たちの優秀な はたらきにより\n:
Firstly, I'd like to recognize your hard work
so far! Thanks to your excellent success, we
now know where the Hall of Old is.

17098.「諸君らの 功績をたたえ\n これを授けよう。受け取れい！:
In honor of your great achievement, I present
you this. Take it!

17099.「はっはっは。おどろいたか。\n ちゃーんと報酬を 用意しておいたのだ。\n こ:
Ahaha. Surprised that I prepared a reward
for you? It's part of being a captain, ya
know!

17100.「さて。まずは 長旅の疲れを いやすがよい。\n 充分に休んだら また探検に出発:
Okay. You should all rest up after that long
journey. After that, we'll go exploring again!
Squadronーdismissed!

17101.「ちがうんだ…… ちがうんだよ。\n オイラ 本当に 幽霊を見たんだ……。:
Really...I'm not lying.
I really DID see a ghost...

17102.「あの雨の日……オイラは\n 授業をサボって 昼寝でもしようと思って\n 桜の間:
It was a rainy day... I decided to ditch class
and hid inside the Chamber of Cherry
Blossoms.

17103.「そしたら その時 ちょうど雷が落ちて……:
And then, out of nowhere, a bolt of lightning
crashed down...

17104.「窓に 白い女の顔が\n 浮かんでるのが 見えたんだ……。:
A woman's face in white...
I saw it floating in the window.
